nl.tno.sensorstorm.impl

Class SyncBuffer

  • java.lang.Object
    • nl.tno.sensorstorm.impl.SyncBuffer
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    FlushingSyncBuffer

    public class SyncBuffer
extends Object
    Class that synchronizes Particles coming from multiple (probably parallel executing) sources and filters out duplicate MetaParticles. This buffer introduces a configurable delay.

    When the delay is 0 the buffer will always immediately return the same particle. Warning: When the size is 0, duplicate MetaParticles will not be filtered out!

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      SyncBuffer(long bufferSizeMs)
      Create a new SyncBuffer with a predefined buffer time.

    • Constructor Detail

      • SyncBuffer

        public SyncBuffer(long bufferSizeMs)
        Create a new SyncBuffer with a predefined buffer time. A value of 0 will effectively disable the buffer, and disable the filtering of duplicate MetaParticles.
        Parameters:
        bufferSizeMs - Amount of time Particles are kept in the buffer in milliseconds

    • Method Detail

      • pushParticle

        public List<Particle> pushParticle(Particle particle)
        Push a new Particle in into the SyncBuffer. When pushing a Particle, zero or more Particles will leave the buffer and can be processed by the Operation. When a Particle is too late to be synchronized it will be rejected.
        Parameters:
        particle - Particle to add to the SyncBuffer
        Returns:
        List of Particle that leave the buffer (can be empty)
        Throws:
        IllegalArgumentException - When the Particle is too late to be synchronized in the buffer

      • flush

        public List<Particle> flush()
        Remove all elements from the SyncBuffer.
        Returns:
        Sorted List of elements that were in the SyncBuffer

      • highestTimestamp

        public long highestTimestamp()
        Return the timestamp of the youngest Particle in the SyncBuffer.
        Returns:
        Highest timestamp of a Particle in the buffer

      • lowestTimestamp

        public long lowestTimestamp()
        Return the timestamp of the oldest Particle in the SyncBuffer.
        Returns:
        Lowest timestamp of a Particle in the buffer

      • size

        public int size()
        Returns:
        Number of Particles in the buffer
